title: Elmer's CraftBond Scrapbook Glue, 4 Piece Set, Natural
description: Elmer's CraftBond Scrapbook Glue Set features everything you need to create strong bonds for paper crafts, scrapbooks, cards, and more. This set includes an Extra Strength Glue Stick, a Glue Stick Pen, a Clear Dual Tip Glue Pen, and a Photo Stiks glue stick--giving you the right glue for virtually any project. Specially formulated to be easy to use on porous surfaces, the craft glues all provide a permanent bond that holds things securely in place. The nontoxic glues apply smoothly and dry clear for professional-looking results.
